observations: There is a horizontal line of 8s in the grid.
Objects are transformed relative to the line of 8s.
Shapes are drawn or filled near the location of the horizontal line of 8s.
The digits on either side of the horizontal line of 8s are modified.
hypotheses: Digits are propagated outward from the row containing 8's.
Digits are transformed based on their proximity to the row of 8s.
Digits are replaced according to their vertical distance from the row containing 8's.
selected_rule: Digits are transformed based on their proximity to the row of 8s.
step_plan: Locate the row containing the digit 8.
Transform nearby digits based on their proximity to the row of 8s, filling the area between the digits and row.
